      • loadNecessaryData

        private void loadNecessaryData()
        This method sets packageNameToJavaTypeNames and standardizedJavaNameToCompilationUnit. It also extracts ClassesOrInterface declarations from compilation units and stores them into classOrInterfaceDeclarations.

      • getExtendedClassOrInterfaces

        Parameters:
